templates.title: Adguard
templates.name: adguard
templates.description: AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads & tracking. After you set it up, it’ll cover ALL your home devices, and you don’t need any client-side software for that. With the rise of Internet-Of-Things and connected devices, it becomes more and more important to be able to control your wnetwork.

templates.title: Airsonic
templates.name: airsonic
templates.description: Airsonic is a free, web-based media streamer, providing ubiqutious access to your music. Use it to share your music with friends, or to listen to your own music while at work. You can stream to multiple players simultaneously, for instance to one player in your kitchen and another in your living room.

templates.title: Authelia
templates.name: authelia
templates.description: An open-source authentication and authorization server providing 2-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal.
templates.note: Requires a configuration.yml file in order to work. Documentation is available here.

templates.title: Bazarr
templates.name: Bazarr
templates.description: Bazarr is a companion application to Sonarr and Radarr. It can manage and download subtitles based on your requirements. You define your preferences by TV show or movie and Bazarr takes care of everything for you.

templates.title: Zus.am
templates.name: Zusam
templates.description: Zusam is a free and open-source way to self-host private forums for groups of friends.

templates.title: Beets
templates.name: beets
templates.description: The purpose of beets is to get your music collection right once and for all. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving its metadata as it goes using the MusicBrainz database. Then it provides a bouquet of tools for manipulating and accessing your music.

templates.title: Vaultwarden
templates.name: vaultwarden
templates.description: This is a Bitwarden server API implementation written in Rust compatible with upstream Bitwarden clients*, perfect for self-hosted deployment where running the official resource-heavy service might not be ideal.
templates.note: This project is not associated with the Bitwarden project nor 8bit Solutions LLC.

templates.title: Booksonic
templates.name: booksonic
templates.description: Booksonic is a server and an app for streaming your audiobooks to any pc or android phone. Most of the functionality is also availiable on other platforms that have apps for subsonic.

templates.title: Bookstack
templates.description: Bookstack is a free and open source Wiki designed for creating beautiful documentation. Feautring a simple, but powerful WYSIWYG editor it allows for teams to create detailed and useful documentation with ease.
templates.note: Default login is admin@admin.com with a password of password. The database created is called bookstackapp and the database user is called bookstack

templates.title: Trilium
templates.name: trilium
templates.description: Trilium Notes is a hierarchical note taking application with focus on building large personal knowledge bases

templates.title: COPS
templates.name: cops
templates.description: COPS links to your Calibre library database and allows downloading and emailing of books directly from a web browser and provides a OPDS feed to connect to your devices.

templates.title: Kavita
templates.name: kavita
templates.description: Lighting fast with a slick design, Kavita is a rocket fueled self-hosted digital library which supports a vast array of file formats. Install to start reading and share your server with your friends.

templates.title: Calibre Web
templates.name: calibre-web
templates.description: Calibre Web is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing Calibre database.
templates.note:
Configuration
  • /config - Where Calibre-web should store it's database
  • /books - Path to your calibre library metadata.db file

templates.title: Chevereto
templates.name: Chevereto
templates.description: Chevereto is a powerful and fast image hosting script that allows you to create your very own full featured image hosting website in just minutes. Please note that this offers only the free Chevereto version.

templates.title: Chowdown
templates.name: Chowdown
templates.description: Have recipes in seconds with plain text formatting and create beatiful recipe pages with automated ease.

templates.title: Tandoor
templates.name: Tandoor
templates.description: The recipe manager that allows you to manage your ever growing collection of digital recipes.

templates.title: Code Server
templates.name: code-server
templates.description: Code-server is VS Code running on a remote server, accessible through the browser.

templates.title: Codiad
templates.name: codiad
templates.description: Codiad is a web-based IDE framework with a small footprint and minimal requirements.

templates.title: CouchPotato
templates.name: couchpotato
templates.description: CouchPotato (CP) is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a "movies I want"-list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the torrent to a specified directory.

templates.title: Daapd
templates.name: daapd
templates.description: DAAP (iTunes) media server with support for AirPlay devices, Apple Remote (and compatibles), MPD and internet radio.

templates.title: DashMachine
templates.name: dashmachine
templates.description: Another application bookmark , with fun features.

templates.title: Davos
templates.name: davos
templates.description: davos is an FTP automation tool that periodically scans given host locations for new files. It can be configured for various purposes, including listening for specific files to appear in the host location, ready for it to download and then move, if required. It also supports completion notifications as well as downstream API calls, to further the workflow.
templates.note:
Configuration
  • /config - AppData Location
  • /downloads - File Download Location

templates.title: DeeMix
templates.name: deemix
templates.description: Deemix is a deezer downloader built from the ashes of Deezloader Remix.
templates.note: Deemix may take a few minutes to install. Be sure to check the logs for details. Refer to this page for userToken details.

templates.title: Deluge
templates.name: deluge
templates.description: Deluge is a lightweight, Free Software, cross-platform BitTorrent client providing: Full Encryption, WebUI, Plugin System, Much more...

templates.title: Domoticz
templates.name: domoticz
templates.description: Domoticz is a Home Automation System that lets you monitor and configure various devices like: Lights, Switches, various sensors/meters like Temperature, Rain, Wind, UV, Electra, Gas, Water and much more. Notifications/Alerts can be sent to any mobile device.

templates.title: Duck DNS
templates.name: duckdns
templates.description: Duck DNS is a free service which will point a DNS (sub domains of duckdns.org) to an IP of your choice. The service is completely free, and doesn't require reactivation or forum posts to maintain its existence.
templates.note:
Configuration
First, go to duckdns site, register your subdomain and retrieve your token
Then run the docker create command above with your subdomain(s) and token
It will update your IP with the DuckDNS service every 5 minutes

templates.title: Duplicati
templates.name: duplicati
templates.description: Free backup software to store encrypted backups online, Duplicati works with standard protocols like FTP, SSH, WebDAV as well as popular services like Microsoft OneDrive, Amazon Cloud Drive and S3, Google Drive, box.com, Mega, hubiC and many others.

templates.title: Emby
templates.name: Emby
templates.description: Emby organizes video, music, live TV, and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices. This container is packaged as a standalone emby Media Server.

templates.title: EmbyStat
templates.name: EmbyStat
templates.description: Embystat is a personal web server that can calculate all kinds of statistics from your (local) Emby server. Just install this on your server and let him calculate all kinds of fun stuff.
templates.note: Access the ui at your-ip:6555. Follow the setup wizard on initial install. Then configure the required services.

templates.title: FileBrowser
templates.name: filebrowser
templates.description: Web File Browser which can be used as a middleware or standalone app.
templates.note: The default user and password is admin/admin.

templates.title: FreshRSS
templates.name: freshrss
templates.description: A free, self-hostable rss aggregator.

templates.title: Gazee
templates.name: gazee
templates.description: A WebApp Comic Reader for your favorite digital comics. Reach and read your comic library from any web connected device with a modern web browser.

templates.title: Guacamole
templates.name: guacamole
templates.description: A clientless remote desktop gateway.
templates.note: The default login will be guacadmin/guacadmin. It is common practice to add a new admin user and remove the default user for Guacamole.

templates.title: Grocy
templates.name: grocy
templates.description: Grocy is an ERP system for your kitchen! Cut down on food waste, and manage your chores with this brilliant utility.

templates.title: HTPC Manager
templates.name: htpcmanager
templates.description: HTPC Manager, a front end for many htpc related applications. Uses the Hellowlol HTPC Manager fork.

templates.title: Headphones
templates.name: headphones
templates.description: Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent, written in Python. It supports SABnzbd, NZBget, Transmission, µTorrent and Blackhole.

templates.title: Heimdall
templates.name: heimdall
templates.description: Heimdall is a way to organise all those links to your most used web sites and web applications in a simple way.

templates.title: Homer
templates.name: homer
templates.description: A dead simple static Homepage for your server to keep your services on hand, from a simple yaml configuration file.
templates.note: This container requires a yml file within the config volume. See the documentation here https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer

templates.title: Dashy
templates.name: Dashy
templates.description: Helps you organize your self-hosted services by making them accessible from a single place.

templates.title: Koillection
templates.name: Koillection
templates.description: Koillection is a self-hosted collection manager created to keep track of physical (mostly) collections of any kind like books, DVDs, stamps, games..

templates.title: Vikunja
templates.name: Vikunja
templates.description: The to-do app to organize your life.| Before use create custom template and Edit: VIKUNJA_SERVICE_FRONTENDURL , VIKUNJA_API_URL & VIKUNJA_SERVICE_JWTSECRET

templates.title: Audiobookshelf
templates.name: Audiobookshelf
templates.description: Self hosted audiobook and podcast server

templates.title: Fenrus
templates.name: Fenrus
templates.description: Fenrus is a Node application and requires NodeJS to run. Once NodeJS is installed you can run Fenrus

templates.title: Authentik
templates.name: Authentik
templates.description: Authentik is an open-source Identity Provider focused on flexibility and versatility

templates.title: Navidrome
templates.name: Navidrome
templates.description: Navidrome is an open source web-based music collection server and streamer. It gives you freedom to listen to your music collection from any browser or mobile device. It's like your personal Spotify!

templates.title: Flame-Dashboard
templates.name: flame-dashboard
templates.description: Flame is self-hosted startpage for your server. Its design is inspired (heavily) by SUI. Flame is very easy to setup and use. With built-in editors, it allows you to setup your very own application hub in no time - no file editing necessary.

templates.title: Huginn
templates.name: huginn
templates.description: Create agents that monitor and act on your behalf.

templates.title: Eufy Security WS
templates.name: eufy-security-ws
templates.description: Eufy Security Web Socket. Edit container and add username & password.

templates.title: Invoice Ninja
templates.name: invoice_ninja
templates.description: Invoices, Expenses and Tasks built with Laravel and Flutter.
templates.note: The database user is invoice_ninja and the database is ninja_db. Please generate an app key following the documentation here.

templates.title: Jackett
templates.name: jackett
templates.description: Jackett works as a proxy server it translates queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries and parses the html response sending results back to the requesting software.

templates.title: Jellyfin
templates.name: jellyfin
templates.description: Jellyfin is a Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media. It is an alternative to the proprietary Emby and Plex, to provide media from a dedicated server to end-user devices via multiple apps.

templates.title: Kodi Headless
templates.name: kodi-headless
templates.description: Headless installation of Kodi™ (formerly known as XBMC™), to enable library updates.

templates.title: LazyLibrarian
templates.name: lazylibrarian
templates.description: LazyLibrarian is a program to follow authors and grab metadata for all your digital reading needs.

templates.title: Let's Encrypt / SWAG
templates.name: letsencrypt / SWAG
templates.description: This container sets up an Nginx webserver and reverse proxy with php support and a built-in letsencrypt client that automates free SSL server certificate generation and renewal processes. It also contains fail2ban for intrusion prevention.
templates.note:
Before running this container, make sure that the url and subdomains are properly forwarded to this container's host.
  • - Port 443 on the internet side of the router should be forwarded to this container's port 443.
  • - If you need a dynamic dns provider, you can use the free provider duckdns.org where the url will be yoursubdomain.duckdns.org and the subdomains can be www,ftp,cloud
  • - The container detects changes to url and subdomains, revokes existing certs and generates new ones during start.
  • - It also detects changes to the DHLEVEL parameter and replaces the dhparams file.
  • - If you'd like to password protect your sites, you can use htpasswd. Run the following command on your host to generate the htpasswd file docker exec -it letsencrypt htpasswd -c /config/nginx/.htpasswd <username>

env.description: GoAccess for NGINX Proxy Manager Logs.
env.name: GoAccessnpm
env.title: GoAccess for NPM logs

env.description: Facebox detects and identifies faces in photos. You can teach facebox with as little as one sample image.
env.name: Facebox
env.title: Facebox

templates.title: LibreSpeed
templates.name: librespeed
templates.description: A Free and Open Source Speedtest for HTML5 and more.

templates.title: Lidarr
templates.name: lidarr
templates.description: Lidarr is a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.

templates.title: Lychee
templates.name: lychee
templates.description: Lychee is a free photo-management tool, which runs on your server or web-space. Installing is a matter of seconds. Upload, manage and share photos like from a native application. Lychee comes with everything you need and all your photos are stored securely.

templates.title: MariaDB
templates.name: mariadb
templates.description: An Enhanced drop in replacement for Mysql.

templates.title: McMyAdmin 2
templates.name: mcmyadmin2
templates.description: McMyAdmin 2 is the leading web control panel and administration console for Minecraft servers.

templates.title: Medusa
templates.name: medusa
templates.description: Medusa, automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

templates.title: Minetest
templates.name: minetest
templates.description: Server version of minetest, a free, open source alternative to minecraft.

templates.title: Pi.alert
templates.name: pi.alert
templates.description: WIFI / LAN intruder detector

templates.title: Minisatip
templates.name: minisatip
templates.description: Minisatip is a multi-threaded satip server version 1.2 that runs under Linux and it was tested with DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-T, DVB-T2, DVB-C, DVB-C2, ATSC and ISDB-T cards. The application is designed to stream the requested data to multiple clients (even with one dvb card) at the same time while opening different pids.

templates.title: Mstream
templates.name: mstream
templates.description: Mstream is a personal music streaming server. You can use mStream to stream your music from your home computer to any device, anywhere. There are mobile apps available for both Android and iPhone.

templates.title: Murmur
templates.name: murmur
templates.description: Mumble is a voicechat program for gamers written on top of Qt and Opus. Murmur is the server backend for Mumble.

templates.title: MusicBrainz
templates.name: musicbrainz
templates.description: MusicBrainz is an open music encyclopedia that collects music metadata and makes it available to the public.

templates.title: Muximux
templates.name: muximux
templates.description: A lightweight portal to view, manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don't need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.

templates.title: Mylar
templates.name: mylar
templates.description: An automated Comic Book downloader (cbr/cbz) for use with SABnzbd, NZBGet and torrents.

templates.title: NZBGet
templates.name: nzbget
templates.description: NZBGet is a usenet downloader, written in C++ and designed with performance in mind to achieve maximum download speed by using very little system resources. It supports all platforms including Windows, Mac, Linux and works on all devices including PC, NAS, WLAN routers and media players.

templates.title: NZBHydra 2
templates.name: nzbhydra2
templates.description: NZBHydra is a meta search for NZB indexers and the "spiritual successor" to NZBmegasearcH. It provides easy access to a number of raw and newznab based indexers.

templates.title: Nextcloud
templates.name: nextcloud
templates.description: Where are your photos and documents? With Nextcloud you pick a server of your choice, at home, in a data center or at a provider. And that is where your files will be. Nextcloud runs on that server, protecting your data and giving you access from your desktop or mobile devices.
templates.note: The database user is nextcloud and the database is nextcloud_db. The host of the database will be located at the bottom of the DB conotainer in portainer.

templates.title: Nginx
templates.name: nginx
templates.description: Nginx is a web server with a strong focus on high concurrency, performance and low memory usage. It can also act as a reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, as well as a load balancer and an HTTP cache.

templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager
templates.name: npm
templates.description: Nginx Proxy Manager enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.

templates.title: OScam
templates.name: oscam
templates.description: OScam is a softcam, software to be used to decrypt digital television channels on a settopbox (receiver), as an alternative for a conditional access module (CAM). The main features of OSCam are next to its softcam capabilities, that it is able to function as a cardserver.

templates.title: Ombi
templates.name: ombi
templates.description: Ombi allows you to host your own Plex Request and user management system.

templates.title: OpenVPN Access Server
templates.name: openvpn-as
templates.description: OpenVPN Access Server is a full featured secure network tunneling VPN software solution that integrates OpenVPN server capabilities, enterprise management capabilities, simplified OpenVPN Connect UI, and OpenVPN Client software packages that accommodate Windows, MAC, Linux, Android, and iOS environments.

templates.title: Organizr
templates.name: organizr-v2
templates.description: Organizr allows you to setup Tabs that will be loaded all in one webpage. You can then work on your server with ease.

templates.title: Overseerr
templates.name: Overseerr
templates.description: Overseerr is a free and open source software application for managing requests for your media library.

templates.title: Owncloud
templates.name: Owncloud
templates.description: ownCloud is a self-hosted file sync and share server. It provides access to your data through a web interface, sync clients or WebDAV while providing a platform to view, sync and share across devices easily—all under your control. ownCloud’s open architecture is extensible via a simple but powerful API for applications and plugins and it works with any storage.
templates.note: The database user is owncloud and the database is owncloud.

templates.title: Petio
templates.name: Petio
templates.description: Petio is a third party companion app available to Plex server owners to allow their users to request, review and discover content.

templates.title: PhotoShow
templates.name: photoshow
templates.description: A simple, easy way to turn a photo album into a webgallery.

templates.title: Pi-Hole
templates.name: pihole
templates.description: A Linux network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application which acts as a DNS sinkhole.
templates.note: When the installation is complete, navigate to your.ip.goes.here:1010/admin. Follow the article here if you run into issues binding to port 53.

templates.title: Piwigo
templates.name: piwigo
templates.description: Piwigo is photo gallery software for the web, built by an active community of users and developers.

templates.title: Plex
templates.name: plex
templates.description: Your favorite movies, TV, music, web shows, podcasts, and more, all streamed to your favorite screens.

templates.title: Plex Requests
templates.name: plexrequests
templates.description: Simple automated way for users to request new content for Plex.

templates.title: ProjectSend
templates.name: projectsend
templates.description: ProjectSend is a self-hosted application that lets you upload files and assign them to specific clients that you create yourself! Secure, private and easy. No more depending on external services or e-mail to send those files.

templates.title: ProtonMail Bridge
templates.name: protonmail-bridge
templates.description: This is an unofficial Docker container of the ProtonMail Bridge. Some of the scripts are based on Hendrik Meyer's work.
templates.note: Please refer to the documentation here to set this up.

templates.title: Prowlarr
templates.name: prowlarr
templates.description: Prowlarr is a indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps. Prowlarr supports both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers. It integrates seamlessly with Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required (we do it all).

templates.title: Pydio
templates.name: pydio
templates.description: Pydio (formerly AjaXplorer) is a mature open source software solution for file sharing and synchronization. With intuitive user interfaces (web / mobile / desktop), Pydio provides enterprise-grade features to gain back control and privacy of your data: user directory connectors, legacy filesystems drivers, comprehensive admin interface, and much more.

templates.title: qBittorrent
templates.name: qbittorrent
templates.description: The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to µTorrent. qBittorrent is based on the Qt toolkit and libtorrent-rasterbar library.

templates.title: Quassel IRC
templates.name: quassel-core
templates.description: Quassel IRC is a modern, cross-platform, distributed IRC client, meaning that one (or multiple) client(s) can attach to and detach from a central core - much like the popular combination of screen and a text-based IRC client such as WeeChat, but graphical. Blowfish support and optional web-ui included.

templates.title: Radarr
templates.name: radarr
templates.description: Radarr - A fork of Sonarr to work with movies à la Couchpotato.

templates.title: Reactive-Resume
templates.name: reactive-resume
templates.description: A one-of-a-kind resume builder that's not out to get your data. Completely secure, customizable, portable, open-source and free forever.

templates.title: Resilio Sync
templates.name: resilio-sync
templates.description: Resilio Sync (formerly BitTorrent Sync) uses the BitTorrent protocol to sync files and folders between all of your devices. There are both free and paid versions, this container supports both.

templates.title: ruTorrent
templates.name: rutorrent
templates.description: Popular torrent client with a webui for ease of use.

templates.title: SABnzbd
templates.name: sabnzbd
templates.description: SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. SABnzbd takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.

templates.title: Shiori
templates.name: shiori
templates.description: Shiori is a simple bookmarks manager written in Go language. Intended as a simple clone of Pocket. You can use it as command line application or as web application.

templates.title: SickChill
templates.name: sickchill
templates.description: Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

templates.title: SickGear
templates.name: sickgear
templates.description: SickGear provides management of TV shows and/or Anime, it detects new episodes, links downloader apps, and more.

templates.title: SmokePing
templates.name: smokeping
templates.description: SmokePing is a latency logging and graphing and alerting system. It consists of a daemon process which organizes the latency measurements and a CGI which presents the graphs.

templates.title: Snibox
templates.name: Snibox
templates.description: Self-hosted snippet manager.
templates.note: Label-oriented interface with search. Supports various programming languages, markdown, plain text.

templates.title: Sonarr
templates.name: sonarr
templates.description: Sonarr (formerly NZBdrone) is a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.

templates.title: SyncThing
templates.name: syncthing
templates.description: Syncthing is a continuous file synchronization program. It synchronizes files between two or more computers in real time, safely protected from prying eyes.

templates.title: Tautulli
templates.name: tautulli
templates.description: Tautulli is a 3rd party application that you can run along side your Plex Media Server to monitor activity and track various statistics. Most importantly, these statistics include what has been watched, who watched it, when and where they watched it, and how it was watched. All statistics are presented in a nice and clean interface with many tables and graphs, which makes it easy to brag about your server to everyone else.
templates.note:
Port 8181 The webui for Tautulli's webui

Configuration
  • /config - Storing Configuration and the Tautulli database
  • /logs - Map to you plex logs (required for IP logging)

templates.title: TheLounge
templates.name: thelounge
templates.description: A self-hosted web IRC client.

templates.title: TiddlyWiki
templates.name: tiddlywiki
templates.description: A unique, non-linear notebook wiki.

templates.title: Tiny Tiny RSS
templates.name: tt-rss
templates.description: Tiny Tiny RSS is an open source web-based news feed (RSS/Atom) reader and aggregator, designed to allow you to read news from any location, while feeling as close to a real desktop application as possible.

templates.title: Transmission
templates.name: transmission
templates.description: Transmission is designed for easy, powerful use. Transmission has the features you want from a BitTorrent client: encryption, a web interface, peer exchange, magnet links, DHT, µTP, UPnP and NAT-PMP port forwarding, webseed support, watch directories, tracker editing, global and per-torrent speed limits, and more.

templates.title: Transmission-OpenVPN
templates.name: transmission-openvpn
templates.description: This container contains OpenVPN and Transmission with a configuration where Transmission is running only when OpenVPN has an active tunnel. It bundles configuration files for many popular VPN providers to make the setup easier.
templates.note: List of supported providers available here.

templates.title: Tvheadend
templates.name: tvheadend
templates.description: Tvheadend is a TV streaming server and recorder for Linux, FreeBSD and Android supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, ISDB-T, IPTV, SAT>IP and HDHomeRun as input sources. Tvheadend offers the HTTP (VLC, MPlayer), HTSP (Kodi, Movian) and SAT>IP streaming. Multiple EPG sources are supported (over-the-air DVB and ATSC including OpenTV DVB extensions, XMLTV, PyXML).

templates.title: Ubooquity
templates.name: ubooquity
templates.description: Ubooquity is a free, lightweight and easy-to-use home server for your comics and ebooks. Use it to access your files from anywhere, with a tablet, an e-reader, a phone or a computer.

templates.title: UniFi Controller
templates.name: unifi-controller
templates.description: The Unifi-controller Controller software is a powerful, enterprise wireless software engine ideal for high-density client deployments requiring low latency and high uptime performance.

templates.title: Watchtower
templates.name: watchtower
templates.description: With watchtower you can update the running version of your containerized app simply by pushing a new image to the Docker Hub or your own image registry. Watchtower will pull down your new image, gracefully shut down your existing container and restart it with the same options that were used when it was deployed initially.
templates.note: It is recommended to manually update your containers but we're including this for those of you that don't care

templates.title: WebGrab+Plus
templates.name: webgrabplus
templates.description: WebGrab+Plus is a multi-site incremental xmltv epg grabber. It collects tv-program guide data from selected tvguide sites for your favourite channels.
templates.note:
Configuration
  • /config - This is where WebGrab+Plus will store it's configuration
  • /data - This is where tv_grab_wg script in the Tvheadend container looks for the guide.xml file.

templates.title: Whoogle
templates.name: whoogle
templates.description: Self-hosted, ad-free, privacy-respecting Google metasearch engine.

templates.title: Wikijs
templates.name: Wikijs
templates.description: Wikijs A modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app built on NodeJS.

templates.title: Yacht
templates.name: yacht
templates.description: A web interface for managing docker containers with an emphasis on templating to provide 1 click deployments. Think of it like a decentralized app store for servers that anyone can make packages for.

templates.title: Uptime Kuma
templates.name: uptime-kuma
templates.description: It is a self-hosted monitoring tool like Uptime Robot

templates.title: Dozzle
templates.name: dozzle
templates.description: Dozzle is a small lightweight application with a web based interface to monitor Docker logs. It doesn’t store any log files. It is for live monitoring of your container logs only.

templates.title: Monica
templates.name: monica
templates.description: Monica is a great open source personal relationship management system to organize the interactions with your loved ones.

templates.title: Netbox
templates.name: netbox
templates.description: NetBox is an infrastructure resource modeling (IRM) application designed to empower network automation. Initially conceived by the network engineering team at DigitalOcean, NetBox was developed specifically to address the needs of network and infrastructure engineers.

templates.title: Freeboard
templates.name: freeboard
templates.description: Freeboard is a turn-key HTML-based 'engine' for dashboards. Besides a nice looking layout engine, it provides a plugin architecture for creating datasources (which fetch data) and widgets (which display data)— freeboard then does all the work to connect the two together.

templates.title: Ghostfolio
templates.name: Ghostfolio
templates.description: Ghostfolio is an open source wealth management software built with web technology.

templates.title: Servas
templates.name: Servas
templates.description: A self-hosted bookmark management tool.

templates.title: Wallabag
templates.name: Wallabag
templates.description: wallabag is a web application allowing you to save web pages for later reading. Click, save and read it when you want.

templates.title: Teleport
templates.name: teleport
templates.description: Teleport allows engineers and security professionals to unify access for SSH servers, Kubernetes clusters, web applications, and databases across all environments.

templates.title: Cryptofolio
templates.name: cryptofolio
templates.description: Cryptofolio is an open-source, and self-hosted solution for tracking your cryptocurrency holdings. It features a web interface, an Android mobile app, and a cross-platform desktop application for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

templates.title: Nodered
templates.name: nodered
templates.description: Node-RED provides a browser-based flow editor that makes it easy to wire together flows using the wide range of nodes in the palette.

templates.title: Change Detection
templates.name: changedetection
templates.description: Self-hosted website change detection monitoring.

templates.title: Reveal.js
templates.name: revealjs
templates.description: It is an open source HTML presentation framework. It enables anyone with a web browser to create fully featured and beautiful presentations for free | Production Mode

templates.title: Statping
templates.name: statping
templates.description: An easy to use Status Page for your websites and applications. Statping will automatically fetch the application and render a beautiful status page with tons of features for you to build an even better status page.

templates.title: NUTS
templates.name: nuts
templates.description: Network UPS Tools server

templates.title: Firefox
templates.name: firefox
templates.description: Firefox Browser, also known as Mozilla Firefox or simply Firefox, is a free and open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and its subsidiary, the Mozilla Corporation. Firefox uses the Gecko layout engine to render web pages, which implements current and anticipated web standards.

templates.title: Homechart
templates.name: homechart
templates.description: Your Budgets, Calendars, Meals, Inventory, Tasks, and so much more in one simple app.For everyone in your household.On all of your devices.In the cloud or self-hosted

templates.title: Webtop
templates.name: webtop
templates.description: Webtop - Alpine, Ubuntu, Fedora, and Arch based containers containing full desktop environments in officially supported flavors accessible via any modern web browser.

templates.title: Ferdi Server
templates.name: ferdi-server
templates.description: Ferdi is a messaging browser that allows you to combine your favourite messaging services into one application

templates.title: Snippet Box
templates.name: snippet-box
templates.description: Snippet Box is a simple self-hosted app for organizing your code snippets. It allows you to easily create, edit, browse and manage your snippets in various languages.

templates.title: Littlelink Server
templates.name: littlelink-server
templates.description: LittleLink is an open source DIY self-hosted alternative to services like Linktree and many.link.

templates.title: Aria2 Pro
templates.name: aria2-pro
templates.description: A perfect Aria2 Docker image. Out of the box, just add download tasks and don't need to think about anything else.

templates.title: Photoprism
templates.name: photoprism
templates.description: PhotoPrism is an AI-powered app for browsing, organizing & sharing your photo collection. It makes use of the latest technologies to tag and find pictures automatically without getting in your way.| Copy as Custom stack and EDIT environment variables.

templates.title: Apprise-API
templates.name: apprise-api
templates.description: Apprise API was designed to easily fit into existing (and new) eco-systems that are looking for a simple notification solution.70+ services

templates.title: Filepizza
templates.name: filepizza
templates.description: Peer-to-peer file transfers in your browser

templates.title: Jump
templates.name: jump
templates.description: Jump is yet another self-hosted startpage for your server designed to be simple, stylish, fast and secure.

templates.title: Hasty-Paste
templates.name: hasty-paste
templates.description: Hasty Paste is a fast and minimal paste bin, written in Python using Quart.

templates.title: Xwiki
templates.name: xwiki
templates.description: Xwiki s a free wiki software platform written in Java with a design emphasis on extensibility. XWiki is an enterprise wiki.

templates.title: Leantime
templates.name: leantime
templates.description: Leantime is an open source project management solution to make your ideas reality.

templates.title: Jellyseer
templates.name: jellyseer
templates.description: Jellyseerr is a free and open source fork of Overseerr for managing requests for your media library. It integrates with your existing services, such as Sonarr, Radarr, and Jellyfin!

templates.title: Trudesk
templates.name: trudesk
templates.description: Trudesk is an Open Source Help Desk Software and Ticketing System

templates.title: Dashdot
templates.name: dashdot
templates.description: Dashdot is a modern server dashboard, running on the latest tech, designed with glassmorphism in mind. It is intended to be used for smaller VPS and private servers.

templates.title: Baserow
templates.name: Baserow
templates.description: Open source no-code database and Airtable alternative.Create your own online database without technical experience. Our user friendly no-code tool gives you the powers of a developer without leaving your browser.

templates.title: Broadlink Manager

templates.description: BroadlinkManager is a Flask powerd, easy to use system that hepls you to work with Broadlink Devices.

templates.title: Homebridge

templates.title: Frigate NVR
templates.name: frigatenvr
templates.description: A complete and local NVR designed for Home Assistant with AI object detection. Uses OpenCV and Tensorflow to perform realtime object detection locally for IP cameras.

templates.title: Umami.is
templates.name: umami
templates.description: Umami is a simple, easy to use, self-hosted web analytics solution. The goal is to provide you with a friendlier, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics and a free, open-sourced alternative to paid solutions

templates.title: Matomo
templates.name: matomo
templates.description: Google Analytics alternative that protects your data and your customers' privacy

templates.title: Neko

templates.description: Simple room management system for n.eko. Self hosted rabb.it alternative. --Please add .env file as stated in neko.yml

templates.title: Ghost
templates.name: ghost
templates.description: Create your own platform on the web. Ghost is a powerful app for new-media creators to publish, share, and grow a business around their content. It comes with modern tools to build a website, publish content, send newsletters & offer paid subscriptions to members.

templates.title: YouTubeDL-Material
templates.name: youtubedl-material
templates.description: YoutubeDL-Material is a Material Design frontend for youtube-dl. It's coded using Angular 9 for the frontend, and Node.js on the backend.

templates.title: ZNC
templates.name: znc
templates.description: ZNC is an IRC network bouncer or BNC. It can detach the client from the actual IRC server, and also from selected channels. Multiple clients from different locations can connect to a single ZNC account simultaneously and therefore appear under the same nickname on IRC.
